name: Survival In-Sync
description:
Survival x Rhythm. Survival is a matter of keeping time and not missing the beat. Simultaneously manage your hunger, thirst, temperature and resources by finding the perfect rhythm to perform life sustaining tasks.

W, F, J, and P keys perform Drinking, Eating, Wood Gathering and Flame Tending activities respectively.

Experiment to find the rhythms of the different actions and try to find a pattern that'll keep you alive.

By Bladdock and Mong00se.
